short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add one question at a time mode to Canvas SpeedGrader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to grade one question at a time in the Canvas Speedgrader.
It also makes the update button additionally move to the next submission.
